wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 203]]'' is published.

==February==
* '''[[2 February|2]]''' - The production of the video game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The White Council]]'' is put on hold indefinitely; it would later be officially cancelled.

==March==
* '''[[1 March|1]]''' - ''[[The Company They Keep]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 March|1]]''' - [[Electronic Arts]] releases ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology|The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology]]''.
* '''[[9 March|9]]-[[11 March|11]]''' - The third "[[The One Ring Celebration]]" is held in [[wikipedia:Burbank, California|Burbank, California]].
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 204]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 4]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 April|17]]   -  ''[[The Children of Húrin]]'' is published'''.
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'' is released.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[Roots and Branches]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''[[1 May|1]]''' - ''[[The History of The Hobbit]]'' Volume 1 is published.
* '''[[9 May|9]]''' - ''[[Quest for Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[15 May|15]]''' - Artist [[Angus McBride]] dies.
* '''[[16 May|16]]''' - The Deluxe Edition of ''[[The Children of Húrin]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 May|17]]''' - Actor [[Noel Appleby]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 205]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[4 June|4]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Official Stage Companion]]'' is published.
* '''[[12 June|12]]''' - The fan film ''[[The Peril to the Shire]]'' premieres to a private audience.
* '''[[14 June|14]]''' - The ninth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Shores of Evendim", is released.
* '''[[19 June|19]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'' premieres at the Theatre Royal Drury Lane in London.
* '''[[26 June|26]]''' - ''[[Tree of Tales]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Vinyar Tengwar 49]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Inside Language]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[13 July|13]]-[[15 July|15]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing IX]]
* '''[[27 July|27]]-[[29 July|29]]''' - [[MerpCon III]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'' 17 is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 206]]'' is published.
==August==
* '''[[3 August|3]]-[[6 August|6]]''' - [[Mythcon 38]].
* '''[[4 August|4]]''' - Author [[Timothy J. Wheeler]] dies.
* '''[[8 August|8]]-[[11 August|11]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Tatya]], the second international conference on Tolkien' s invented languages
* '''[[21 August|21]]''' - The tenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The City of Kings", is released in North America.
* '''[[24 August|24]]''' - The tenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The City of Kings", is released in Europe.
* '''[[25 August|25]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Australian Seminar 2007 in Sydney, [[Australia]].
* '''[[27 August|27]]''' - ''[[The Frodo Franchise]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[10 September|10]]''' - ''[[From Mind to Mind|"from mind to mind": Robert Browning and J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[14 September|14]]-[[16 September|16]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2007]].
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' - ''[[The History of The Hobbit]]'' is published in the United States.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 207]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - The second and expanded edition of ''[[Tolkien On Fairy-stories]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' – The redesigned slipcased edition of ''[[Mr. Bliss]]'' is published.
* '''[[5 October|5]]-[[7 October|7]]''' - ''Cair Andros'', a feast of the [[Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin]] (or "The Prancing Pony").
* '''[[12 October|12]]-[[15 October|15]]''' - [[Ring*Con 2007]].
* '''[[24 October|24]]''' - The eleventh book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Prisoner of the Free Peoples" is released in North America.
* '''[[25 October|25]]''' - The eleventh book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Prisoner of the Free Peoples", is released in Europe.

==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - ''[[Essential Tolkien]]'' audiobook is released.
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[Myth and Magic: Art according to the Inklings]]'' is published.
* '''[[19 November|19]]''' - ''[[The Children of Húrin Signed Limited Edition]]'' is published.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 208]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians]]'' is published.
* '''[[18 December|18]]''' - [[New Line Cinema]] and [[MGM]] announce the development of [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].

==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Mordor (book)|The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Mordor]]'' is published.
